cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence.InfluenceLayer

  • Packages that use InfluenceLayer 
    Package Description
    cz.cuni.mff.kocur.botGraphics
    Package that represents agent's custom graphics tab.
    cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence
    Package that contain influence maps implementation.
    kocur.lina.agent
    Package with classes that implement our Sniper agent.

      Subclasses of InfluenceLayer in cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ContextualLayer
      If we are working with agent, most of it's influence layers will be moving with him and will represents his surroundings.
      class  DireThreatLayer
      Dire threats layer.
      class  EnemyThreatsLayer
      Threat layer that is generated for Lina using her context.
      class  FarmingLayer
      Layer that represents farming influence.
      class  FOWLayer
      Layer that stores our field of view inside the influence map.
      class  FriendlyThreatsLayer
      Class that stores friendly (from the agent's perspective) threats to the influence layer.
      class  GoalLayer
      Layers that stores goals inside.
      class  HeightsLayer
      This layer represents heights.
      class  RadiantThreatLayer
      Class that represents radiant threats.
